message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.NE 

This paper deals with modeling complex spatio-temporal patterns in high-dimensional motion data, which is a common problem in computer vision. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a learning method for the extended RBM model, which falls under the sub-category cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper introduces a new method for multi-class classification, which is related to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The proposed algorithm is evaluated on two computer vision applications, facial expression recognition and human action recognition, which are both related to cs.MM (Multimedia). Finally, the paper uses RBM as a generative model for classification purpose, which is related to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
